TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StopWordsRemovingTransformer extends Microsoft.ML.Data.OneToOneTransformerBase
Public NotInheritable Class StopWordsRemovingTransformer Inherits OneToOneTransformerBase

Docs.summary: A Stopword remover transform based on language-specific lists of stop words (most common words) from Office Named Entity Recognition project. The transform is usually applied after tokenizing text, so it compares individual tokens (case-insensitive comparison) to the stopwords.
